Clone the Repository 63 ```bash 64 git clone https://github.com/demonically2004/ziota.git 65 cd ziota 66 ``` 67 68 ### 2. Install Backend Dependencies 69 ```bash 70 npm install 71 ``` 72 73 ### 3. Install Frontend Dependencies 74 ```bash 75 cd frontend 76 npm install 77 cd .. 78 ``` 79 80 ### 4. Environment Configuration 81 Create a `.env` file in the root directory: ... 171 172 ``` 173 ziota/ 174 ├── config/ # Configuration files 175 │ ├── database.js # MongoDB connection 176 │ ├── firebaseAdmin.js # Firebase Admin setup 177 │ └── firebase-adminsdk.json 178 ├── frontend/ # React frontend 179 │ ├── public/ # Static files 180 │ ├── src/ # Source code 181 │ │ ├── components/ # React components 182 │ │ ├── services/ # API services 183 │ │ └── config/ # Frontend configuration 184 │ └── build/ # Production build 185 ├── middleware/ # Express middleware 186 │ ├── auth.js # Authentication middleware 187 │ ├── unifiedAuth.js # Unified auth for JWT/Firebase 188 │ └── verifyToken.js # Token verification 189 ├── models/ # MongoDB models 190 │ ├── Users.js # User schema 191 │ ├── Courses.js # Course schema 192 │ └── Enrollment.js # Enrollment schema 193 ├── routes/ # API routes 194 │ ├── authRoutes.js # Authentication endpoints 195 │ ├── userDataRoutes.js # User data management 196 │ ├── courses.js # Course management 197 │ └── subjectRoutes.js # Subject-specific routes 198 ├── public/ # Static assets 199 ├── .env # Environment variables 200 ├── server.js # Main server file 201 └── package.json # Dependencies and scripts 202 ``` 203 204 ## API Endpoints 205 206 ### Authentication 207 - `POST /auth/register` - User registration 208 - `POST /auth/login` - User login 209 - `POST /auth/check-user` - Verify Firebase token 210 - `POST /auth/logout` - User logout ... Path: CHANGELOG.md 1 # Changelog 2 3 All notable changes to the Ziota project will be documented in this file. 4 5 ## [1.1.0] - 2024-12-XX 6 7 ### Added 8 - Comprehensive README.md with detailed project documentation 9 - Vercel deployment configuration with vercel.json 10 - Environment variable examples (.env.example files) 11 - Detailed deployment guide (DEPLOYMENT.md) 12 - Deployment test script for configuration verification 13 - MIT License file 14 - Changelog for tracking project updates 15 16 ### Changed 17 - Updated package.json scripts for better Vercel compatibility 18 - Enhanced CORS configuration for production deployment 19 - Fixed API URL inconsistencies across frontend components 20 - Improved authentication flow with unified middleware ... Path: node_modules/@js-sdsl/ordered-map/README.zh-CN.md ... 20 21

English | 简体中文

22 23 ## ✨ 包含的数据结构 24 25 - **Stack** - 先进后出的堆栈 26 - **Queue** - 先进先出的队列 27 - **PriorityQueue** - 堆实现的优先级队列 28 - **Vector** - 受保护的数组，不能直接操作像 `length` 这样的属性 29 - **LinkList** - 非连续内存地址的链表 30 - **Deque** - 双端队列，向前和向后插入元素或按索引获取元素的时间复杂度为 O(1) 31 - **OrderedSet** - 由红黑树实现的排序集合 32 - **OrderedMap** - 由红黑树实现的排序字典 33 - **HashSet** - 参考 [ES6 Set polyfill](https://github.com/rousan/collections-es6) 实现的哈希集合 34 - **HashMap** - 参考 [ES6 Set polyfill](https://github.com/rousan/collections-es6) 实现的哈希字典 35 36 ## ⚔️ 基准测试 37 38 我们和其他数据结构库进行了基准测试，在某些场景我们甚至超过了当前最流行的库 39 40 查看 [benchmark](https://js-sdsl.org/#/zh-cn/test/benchmark-analyze) 以获取更多信息 41 42 ## 支持的平台 ... 79 80 并且我们提供了完整的 [API 文档](https://js-sdsl.org/js-sdsl/index.html)供您参考 81 82 想要查看从前版本的文档，请访问： 83 84 `https://js-sdsl.org/js-sdsl/previous/v${version}/index.html` 85 86 例如： 87 88 [https://js-sdsl.org/js-sdsl/previous/v4.1.5/index.html](https://js-sdsl.org/js-sdsl/previous/v4.1.5/index.html) 89 90 ### 在浏览器中使用 91 92 ```html 93 94 111 ``` 112 113 ### npm 引入 114 115 ```javascript 116 // esModule 117 import { OrderedMap } from 'js-sdsl'; 118 // commonJs 119 const { OrderedMap } = require('js-sdsl'); 120 const myOrderedMap = new OrderedMap(); 121 myOrderedMap.setElement(1, 2); 122 console.log(myOrderedMap.getElementByKey(1)); // 2 123 ``` 124 125 ## 测试 126 127 ### 单元测试 128 129 我们使用 [karma](https://karma-runner.github.io/) 和 [mocha](https://mochajs.org/) 框架进行单元测试，并同步到 [coveralls](https://coveralls.io/github/js-sdsl/js-sdsl) 上，你可以使用 `yarn test:unit` 命令来重建它 130 131 ### 对于性能的校验 132 133 我们对于编写的所有 API 进行了性能测试，并将结果同步到了 [`gh-pages/performance.md`](https://github.com/js-sdsl/js-sdsl/blob/gh-pages/performance.md) 中，你可以通过 `yarn test:performance` 命令来重现它 134 135 您也可以访问[我们的网站](https://js-sdsl.org/#/zh-cn/test/performance-test)来获取结果 136 137 ## ⌨️ 开发 138 139 可以使用 Gitpod 进行在线编辑： ... Path: node_modules/escalade/readme.md 1 # escalade [![CI](https://github.com/lukeed/escalade/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/lukeed/escalade/actions) [![licenses](https://licenses.dev/b/npm/escalade)](https://licenses.dev/npm/escalade) [![codecov](https://badgen.now.sh/codecov/c/github/lukeed/escalade)](https://codecov.io/gh/lukeed/escalade) 2 3 > A tiny (183B to 210B) and [fast](#benchmarks) utility to ascend parent directories 4 5 With [escalade](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Escalade), you can scale parent directories until you've found what you're looking for.
Given an input file or directory, `escalade` will continue executing your callback function until either: 6 7 1) the callback returns a truthy value 8 2) `escalade` has reached the system root directory (eg, `/`) ... 59 res.setHeader("Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy", "credentialless"); 60 next(); 61 }); 62 63 // ✅ Ensure MongoDB URI is Provided 64 if (!process.env.MONGO_URI) { 65 console.error("❌ ERROR: MONGO_URI is missing in .env file."); I've successfully indexed the Ziota codebase. Here's a comprehensive overview: ## Ziota - Personal Learning Dashboard **Project Type**: Full-stack web application for personal learning management ### **Architecture Overview** - **Backend**: Node.js/Express server with MongoDB database - **Frontend**: React 19 application with modern routing - **Authentication**: Dual system (Firebase OAuth + traditional email/password) - **File Storage**: Cloudinary integration for file uploads - **Deployment**: Configured for Vercel with production optimizations ### **Key Technologies** **Backend Stack:** - Express.js server with CORS and security middleware - MongoDB with Mongoose ODM - Firebase Admin SDK for authentication - JWT tokens for stateless auth - Cloudinary for file storage - Redis for session management **Frontend Stack:** - React 19 with lazy loading - React Router DOM for navigation - Axios for API communication - Firebase SDK for client-side auth - FontAwesome icons - Modern CSS with gradients and animations ### **Core Features** 1. **Authentication System**: Supports both Google OAuth and traditional login 2. **Subject Management**: Organized learning with subjects like Java, Python, AI, etc. 3. **Note-Taking**: Personal and subject-specific notes 4. **File Management**: Upload/download files with Cloudinary storage 5. **Dark Mode**: User preference support 6. **Responsive Design**: Modern UI with loading states ### **Project Structure** ``` ziota/ ├── config/ # Database & Firebase configuration ├── frontend/ # React application ├── middleware/ # Authentication & security middleware ├── models/ # MongoDB schemas (Users, Courses, Enrollment) ├── routes/ # API endpoints (auth, courses, subjects, user data) ├── public/ # Static assets └── server.js # Main Express server ``` ### **Key Components** - **User Management**: Complete user profiles with subjects and preferences - **Course System**: Structured learning with enrollment tracking - **File System**: Secure file upload/download with Cloudinary - **Subject Organization**: Theory and lab sections for each subject - **Admin Features**: Admin access with special authentication The codebase is well-organized, production-ready, and follows modern development practices with proper error handling, security measures, and deployment configurations.
